name: Hoof
description:
The plains of Africa can be a harsh place for any young pony who has just been evicted from the'r herd. 

You play as this young pony who has been kicked out of their lifelong herd because the leader doesn't agree with your life decisions.

All alone you must avoid dangers such as Lions and Hyenas as well as finding and befriending other lone horses in order to build a herd which is a "Safe Space" for all who join.

This game was made as part of Rainbow Jam 2018, the devlog for this project can be found here!. All future Devlogs (if any) will be posted through this project's Devlog pages.
